(a) Outward Taxable supplies (other than zero rated, nil rated and exempted)
b2b.tax_base + b2cl.tax_base + b2cs.tax_base + de.tax_base + cdnr_b2b_regular.tax_base + cdnr_b2b_reverse_charge.tax_base + cdnr_de.tax_base + cdnur_b2cl.tax_base

(c) Other Outward Taxable supplies (Nil rated, exempted)
3.1.1 Details of Supplies notified under section 9(5) of the CGST Act, 2017 and corresponding provisions in IGST/UTGST/SGST Acts
(i) Taxable supplies on which electronic commerce operator pays tax u/s 9(5) [to be furnished by electronic commerce operator] (Manual)

(ii) Taxable supplies made by registered person through electronic commerce operator, on which electronic commerce operator is required to pay tax u/s 9(5) [to be furnished by registered person making supplies through electronic commerce operator]
3.2 Out of the supplies shown in 3.1 (a), details of inter-state supplies made to unregistered persons, composition taxable person and UIN holders
Supplies made to Composition Taxable Persons
(A) ITC Available (Whether in full or part)
(3) Inward supplies liable to reverse charge (other than 1 & 2 above)
(1) As per rules 38,42 & 43 of CGST Rules and section 17(5)
(1) ITC reclaimed which was reversed under Table 4(B)(2) in earlier tax period (Manual)
(2) Ineligible ITC under section 16(4) & ITC restricted due to Pos rules (Manual)
